price: Bagaimana Allah akan menunjuki suatu kaum yang kafir sesudah mereka beriman, serta mereka telah mengakui bahwa rasul itu (Muhammad) benar-benar rasul, dan keterangan-keterangan pun telah datang kepada mereka? Allah tidak menunjuki orang-orang yang zalim.
arabic: كَيۡفَ يَهۡدِي ٱللَّهُ قَوۡمٗا كَفَرُواْ بَعۡدَ إِيمَٰنِهِمۡ وَشَهِدُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلرَّسُولَ حَقّٞ وَجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kayfa yahdī al-lahu qawman kafarū baʿda īmānihim washahidū anna al-rasūla ḥaqqun wajāahumu al-bayinātu wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
